title: Movie Year Quiz
description: Can you guess when these classic movies were released?

questions.question: In what year was 'The Wizard of Oz' released?
questions.explanation: 'The Wizard of Oz' was released in 1939, starring Judy Garland. It is one of the most beloved films in cinema history.

questions.question: In what year was the original 'Star Wars' (Episode IV) released?
questions.explanation: The original 'Star Wars' (later subtitled 'A New Hope') was released in 1977 and became a massive cultural phenomenon.

questions.question: In what year was 'Jaws' released?
questions.explanation: 'Jaws' was released in 1975, directed by Steven Spielberg. It is often considered the first summer blockbuster.

questions.question: In what year was 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial' released?
questions.explanation: 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial' was released in 1982, directed by Steven Spielberg. It became the highest-grossing film of its time.

questions.question: In what year was 'Gone with the Wind' released?
questions.explanation: 'Gone with the Wind' was released in 1939, the same year as 'The Wizard of Oz.' It won eight Academy Awards including Best Picture.

questions.question: In what year was 'The Godfather' released?
questions.explanation: 'The Godfather' was released in 1972, directed by Francis Ford Coppola. It won the Academy Award for Best Picture.

questions.question: In what year was 'Casablanca' released?
questions.explanation: 'Casablanca' was released in 1942, starring Humphrey Bogart and Ingrid Bergman. It won three Academy Awards including Best Picture.

questions.question: In what year was 'Schindler's List' released?
questions.explanation: 'Schindler's List' was released in 1993, directed by Steven Spielberg. It won seven Academy Awards including Best Picture and Best Director.

questions.question: In what year was 'Titanic' released?
questions.explanation: 'Titanic' was released in 1997, directed by James Cameron. It won 11 Academy Awards and was the highest-grossing film for over a decade.

questions.question: In what year was 'Psycho' by Alfred Hitchcock released?
questions.explanation: 'Psycho' was released in 1960. Directed by Alfred Hitchcock, it is considered one of the greatest horror films ever made.

questions.question: In what year was 'Forrest Gump' released?
questions.explanation: 'Forrest Gump' was released in 1994, starring Tom Hanks. It won six Academy Awards including Best Picture and Best Actor.

questions.question: In what year was 'The Sound of Music' released?
questions.explanation: 'The Sound of Music' was released in 1965, starring Julie Andrews. It won five Academy Awards including Best Picture.

questions.question: In what year was 'Singin' in the Rain' released?
questions.explanation: 'Singin' in the Rain' was released in 1952, starring Gene Kelly, Donald O'Connor, and Debbie Reynolds. It is considered one of the greatest musicals ever made.

questions.question: In what year was 'Back to the Future' released?
questions.explanation: 'Back to the Future' was released in 1985, directed by Robert Zemeckis and starring Michael J. Fox. It became the highest-grossing film of 1985.

questions.question: In what year was '2001: A Space Odyssey' released?
questions.explanation: '2001: A Space Odyssey' was released in 1968, directed by Stanley Kubrick. It is widely regarded as one of the most influential films in cinema history.
